name: Bondage Black Jack
description:
4 female blackjack players are not satisfied with their tournament results. They will be lucky enough to meet a bondage master.
The player will play as the bondage master and will have to face the 4 girls, one at a time, in a game of blackjack. Each hand won by the player, the girl will take off a piece of her dress. Her up to remain completely naked. At this point the player can choose between 4 different sex scenes. Subsequently the player will be able to challenge the girl again, in case of a new victory he will be able to choose another sex scene. The same thing for every girl.

In this game:
1) Introduction with 100 pictures and a thousand words of dialogue.
2) 16 full hd animations.
3) One replay gallery.
4) The game of blackjack.
